Package stratpoint.samuelnieva.ServiceLayer

Interface CatalogService

public interface CatalogService
The Catalog interface meant to represent a catalog of products a user of an e-commerce website can choose from.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ProductEntity
    addFromQuery(int n)
    Returns a product from the queryList which is displayed after calling searchProduct.
    void
    addProduct(ProductEntity p)
    Adds a product into the Catalog's list of products.
    void
    delProduct(int n)
    Deletes a product from the catalog's productList variable.
    void
    outputProducts()
    Output products within the Catalog using the outputInfo method of each of the products inside.
    void
    searchProduct(String q)
    Searches for a product using a query.

  • Method Details

    • outputProducts

      void outputProducts()
      Output products within the Catalog using the outputInfo method of each of the products inside.

    • addProduct

      void addProduct(ProductEntity p)
      Adds a product into the Catalog's list of products.
      Parameters:
      p - The Product object to be added.

    • delProduct

      void delProduct(int n)
      Deletes a product from the catalog's productList variable.
      Parameters:
      n - The index of the product to be deleted.

    • searchProduct

      void searchProduct(String q)
      Searches for a product using a query. This query is compared against the name, brand, and category of the product. The respective products are added to the Catalog's queryList.
      Parameters:
      q - the q

    • addFromQuery

      ProductEntity addFromQuery(int n)
      Returns a product from the queryList which is displayed after calling searchProduct. The index to be used has to coincide with the queryList ArrayList. This function should only be called after calling searchProduct so the user can see the list of products they can choose from.
      Parameters:
      n - The index of the product within the queryList to be added to the productList of the Cart
      Returns:
      The product object to be added to the cart
